meanings.definition: A group of anticoagulant drugs that prevent blood clots.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed heparins to prevent blood clots after surgery.
meanings.sent2: The hospital keeps heparins on hand to treat patients with clotting issues.
meanings.sent3: The heparins danced gracefully through the bloodstream, keeping clots at bay.
meanings.sent4: Like vigilant guards, heparins stand ready to thwart any clotting attempts.
meanings.sent5: The heparins acted as silent protectors, ensuring the blood flowed freely.
